description:
Your search for well fitting, great value cycling shorts ends here. 6-panel design gives you an impeccable ergonomic fit, with a pressure-relieving chamois to increase blood flow and comfort. Silicone leg grippers prevent your shorts creeping up.

  • Transfer fabric provides high moisture transfer to keep you comfortable
  • Variable thickness Levitate chamois for chafe-free comfort
  • Paneled anatomic design provides a precise fit
  • Silicone print at the hem ensures the shorts stays put
  • 2.5cm plush waistband
  • BioViz® reflective elements for low-light visibility
name: Pearl Izumi Quest Shorts - Men's
